name: Letting Go
description:
This game is a part of my assignments for studying Bachelor of Game development at SAE. The assignment is to create a short autobiographical video game about an experience in my life, and some of the creative limitations I have to deal with is the following.

Creative Limitations:

  • Solo project
  • Can be played to completion in 5 minutes or less
  • Focused on only one aspect of your life

Letting Go is based on an personal experience about moving on from people you thought who always be in your life but for personal reasons, you have to let them go in order to focus on yourself and become a better you.

Current status:

The game is currently in its prototype phase meaning it has a lot of issues and missing features I have yet to implement. As for whether the game will become completed, I don't have any plans to continue on working on it once the assignment is completed.

Controls:

  • WASD keys to move around
  • Mouse to look around the environments
  • Escape key to open/close the pause menu
    • NOTE: Will freeze the cutscenes but press the escape key if it does.

Google Questionnaire: (Feedback always appreciated but not required)
